product_name: olloclip Telephoto Lens + Circular Polarizing Lens - iPhone 5
long_description: The olloclip Telephoto Lens + Circular Polarizing Lens adds 2x optical magnification to your iPhone 5 or iPod Touch 5th generation camera. Turn it around to reduce glare and make colors stand out.
short_description: The olloclip Telephoto Lens + Circular Polarizing Lens adds 2x optical magnification to your iPhone 5 or iPod Touch 5th generation camera. Turn it around to reduce glare and make colors stand out.
